name: The Empress Of Mahjong
description:
The Empress invites you to play! Immerse yourself in the amazingly beautiful locations of Asia and complete mahjong levels approved by the Empress herself!

You'll find a variety of Mahjong layouts in the game! Levels for every taste, from simple and classic to exquisitely themed. Quick blitz levels to pass the time. Multi-layered levels and huge 200 chip layouts! What else do you need for long evenings?

- collect gold chips to pass the levels and unlock the next location
- collect bonus chips and get extra coins and bonuses
- combo multiplier to boost your coins
- 6 locations
- 120 levels
- 2 game modes of difficulty
